column5: I apologize now if you've already seen some of these pics from Big Cliff's thread, but if you haven't, here's a few from today.  After a bunch of us got Big Cliff's dock in place, my little one couldn't wait to get out there to brave the wind and cold to catch a few from there.  Her line was in the water for mere seconds when she landed her first rock bass of the year...she was excited to catch this one!!   A few more came in as well....one perch was a pretty decent size too!     We left Big Cliff's and started to head home...but Sydney wanted to catch some more fish so we headed for her favourite shore spot on Lake Scugog.  Here she learned how to lip a fish...in preparation for some largies or smallies later this summer....and she was fascinated with releasing them as well...     After we got home, Bly and I decided to head out to see if the carp were swimming around...and we were not disappointed!  I got a little one (in comparison to Blys!!).  It came in at 31"...and is my first entry for the tourney!  I forgot my team sign, so we had to write this one up quickly!   Bly, not to be outdone, went and landed her PB carp...and monster at 37.5" and 25 pounds.  This one took a while to get in...it stayed deep all the way in and really tested her skills...especially since it was pitch dark out....anyways...here's the monster!   All in all, we had a GREAT Sunday....hope the weather holds up....would love to get the boat out next weekend.
very nice fish,congrats on the pb
Way to go Bly!!!  -  thats what I meant this morning when I said that I didn't recognize you without a big fish in your hands!  Congrats on a P.B.   Don      Oh -- and Cliff - your fish is nice too!!

Thanks Don   It was great getting to spend some time with you today!   I had just finished telling Cliff about your comment and that if I caught one tonight, I should dedicate it to you...45 seconds later....FISH ON!
Nice fish!!!  Congrats on the PB Bly! Thats a busy day, family fishing in the day and then grown up fishing at night lol  -Ben
Surprised Cliff didn't borrow that big ugly bugger for his team Bly! Thanks for keeping him honest! LOL
Wow man! You guys are hard core. No wonder you post so late, you're just getting in from fishing!!
Nice fish Bly and Jr. Bly!!! You did okay too ccmt.
both carp are monsters!
Great report and pics!!!   and congratulations to Bly for her new PB and to Cliff for the first Carp entry in the tourney!!!
Congrats on yet another PB bly!  i agree with scuro lol ... cliff i think the ladies are starting to outfish you ... better catch up
Beauty fish there Carol, CONGRATS!!!  Maureen
Congrats Carole on the new PB. Fantastic report.
HOLY CARP CAROLE!!!    Lol, Cliff, you look like a widdle puppy.  Awwwwwwwwwwwww
Nice fish ! I also got my first carp of the year yesterday. Thank God there are fish swimming in water ;-)
Holy crap Carole, thats a giant.  Congratulations.  And thanks for playing Cliff - we have some wonderful parting gifts for you
Wow! That's a nice rock bass (1st pic) Way to go!   Oh yeah........the carps are pretty good too.
This has to be one scary family for every fish out there!
Sounds like a perfect Sunday indeed (a lot better than mine that's for sure  ).
Great fish, congrats
Way to go, looks like you all had a great weekend.  Huge Carp     Congrats.  Joey
You can post that tourney entry here Cliff: http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=17538
